metadata.name: Helium Balloon
metadata.description:
The idea Helium Balloon came to me in a dream that combined the famous Nyan balloon by @PRguitarman flying with checked balloons inspired by Jack Butcher.

Instead of cat, I saw Elon Musk in the cat's body flying into the sky faster and faster... I finally woke up from this bizarre dream at that moment. Maybe this is a nightmare?

It may or may not have utility in the future. Just a meme or burn? ðŸ”¥ 

To Mars and beyond! LFG ðŸŽˆðŸš€
